title: Collaboration Learning Based on Design Patterns for Online Learning Inclusivity and Quality Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Online learning experience and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Collaboration learning environment utilizing VR simulations in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology setting.

learning_goals: Learners collaborate with peers from diverse backgrounds using design patterns to build inclusive online learning environments.
Learners generate educational designs applicable to real-world social problem-solving using simulation/VR tools.
Learners continuously improve their learning processes through data-driven feedback and meet formative assessment criteria.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
